"Vladimir R. Bossicard" wrote:

>  > Have you checked XMLUnit: http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/?

Whoa! Did you see this:
   "Even treat badly formed HTML as XML so it can be tested too."

How on earth did they do that, and can that parser be extracted?!!
